channel.title: Help with place where you go on death
channel.description: Can somone help me please? I am trying to make it so that when you di you go to the new home i set up but atm you go to the old home and its really annoying as that has all the really high monsters in atm, so they just keep on dieing :( Can someone help me change where they respawn please?

item.title: Help with place where you go on death
item.dc:creator: @speedhighway speedhighway
item.description:
@speedhighway wrote:

hmm i dont see why that wouldn’t work, are you sure the number u hit when u search is a coordinate? it’s possible that u searched the number and got something else, remember, it will be 2 sets of numbers and u;ll see x and y in the line

i probably didn’t help much lol but i’m just making sure u didnt make that mistake

Read full topic
item.source: Help with place where you go on death

item.title: Help with place where you go on death

@Brenz wrote:

Which bit isnt working, can u get the coords ?

Brendan

item.title: Help with place where you go on death
item.dc:creator: @vrac_defiled vrac defiled
item.description:
@vrac_defiled wrote:

dying is in client.java

when you start, thats in player.java

anywyays, just die, then when you get home DONT MOVE and do ::mypos. Then take one of the coords, open client.java and search for that coord.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with place where you go on death

item.title: Help with place where you go on death
item.dc:creator: @jarnohhh jarnohhh
item.description:
@jarnohhh wrote:

Go to the place were you die, than do ::mypos or ::coords, than go in your player.java or client.java and search for one of the coords that ::mypos give. And than you find the 2 coords and change it to your new home

Read full topic
